attributes.action: approve a tunnel under the Forth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We support the building of a tunnel under the river Forth instead of a bridge. This would allow traffic North to South, and vice-versa, in poor weather and allow increasingly heavy vehicles.
It is also more environmentally pleasing to the eye and would reduce congestion around the West Fife and South Queensferry area.
